meta.description: Company hiring problem to minimize salary costs

vars.name: x
vars.description: x[c] = 1 if candidate c is hired, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_total_salary
objective.expr: sum(salary[c] * x[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
objective.description: Minimize total salary of selected candidates

constraints.name: max_employees
constraints.description: At most 3 candidates can be hired

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(salary[c] * x[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
constraints.description: Total salary must not exceed the budget of $35,000

constraints.name: min_degree_requirement
constraints.description: At least one candidate with a Master's or PhD degree must be hired

constraints.name: min_experience
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(experience[c] * x[c] for c in CANDIDATES)
constraints.description: Total work experience of selected candidates must be at least 12 years

constraints.name: at_most_one_A_or_E
constraints.description: At most one of candidates A or E can be hired

constraints.name: min_employees
constraints.description: At least 2 candidates must be hired
